title: Introduction to ANOVABNPTestR
text: First, need train model. response takes values real line, use anova_bnp_normal() (see anova_bnp_poisson() counts anova_bnp_bernoulli() Boolean variables):
code: yvec <- example_01[[1]] Xmat <- example_01[, 2:3] |> as.matrix() fit <- anova_bnp_normal(yvec, Xmat)

title: Introduction to ANOVABNPTestR
text: model trained, can test simple effects using hypothesis_post_simple(): tibble, var1 specifies factor consideration, prob posterior probability simple effect factor. prob always low, little support simple effects.

title: Introduction to ANOVABNPTestR
text: similar, can test interaction effects using hypothesis_post_interaction(): tibble, var1 var2 specify interaction consideration, prob posterior probability simple effect interaction. prob nearly 1, great support interaction effect.

title: Introduction to ANOVABNPTestR
text: addition main tests functions, ANOVABNPTestR can also plot posterior predictive density (ppd) response common scenarios. example, function predictive_plot_simple() displays ppd level particular factor, setting factors reference level. can see, nearly difference group distributions, agreement output tests.

title: Introduction to ANOVABNPTestR
text: similar way, function predictive_plot_interaction() displays ppd level particular interaction, setting factors reference level. can see, marked difference group distributions, agreement output tests.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Iván Gutiérrez. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Gutiérrez (2024). ANOVABNPTestR: Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://igutierrezm.github.io/ANOVABNPTestR/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {ANOVABNPTestR: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA},   author = {Iván Gutiérrez},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://igutierrezm.github.io/ANOVABNPTestR/}, }

title: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA
text: R package implements (BNP) Factorial ANOVA model described Gutiérrez et al. (2021). See documentation details getting started vignette working example.

title: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA
text: can install ANOVABNPTestR source follows: install R package ANOVABNPTestR, Julia packages depends. order install Julia packages, run need .

title: A Bayesian Nonparametric Factorial ANOVA
text: ANOVABNPTestR requires Julia v1.6.1+. can download , install following instructions.

what: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel. — anova_bnp_bernoulli
title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel. — anova_bnp_bernoulli
text: Fit Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model Bernoulli kernel.

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel. — anova_bnp_bernoulli
code: anova_bnp_bernoulli(   y,   X,   iter = 4000L,   warmup = 2000L,   seed = 1L,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   a2 = 2,   b2 = 4,   lb = min(y),   ub = max(y) )

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel. — anova_bnp_bernoulli
text: y boolean response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations (default 4000). warmup number warmup mcmc iterations (default 2000). seed seed random number generation (default 1L). rho hyperparameter \(\rho\) (default 1.0). hyperparameter \(\) (default 1.0). b hyperparameter \(b\) (default 1.0). a2 hyperparameter \(a_2\) (default 2.0). b2 hyperparameter \(b_2\) (default 4.0).

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Bernoulli kernel. — anova_bnp_bernoulli
text: object class 'anova_bnp_model'.

what: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with BerPoi kernel. — anova_bnp_berpoi
title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with BerPoi kernel. — anova_bnp_berpoi
text: Fit Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model BerPoi kernel.

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with BerPoi kernel. — anova_bnp_berpoi
code: anova_bnp_berpoi(   y,   X,   iter = 4000L,   warmup = 2000L,   seed = 1L,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   a1 = 2,   b1 = 4,   alpha0 = 1,   beta0 = 1,   lb = min(y),   ub = max(y) )

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with BerPoi kernel. — anova_bnp_berpoi
text: y integer response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations (default 4000). warmup number warmup mcmc iterations (default 2000). seed seed random number generation (default 1L). rho hyperparameter \(\rho\) (default 1.0). hyperparameter \(\) (default 1.0). b hyperparameter \(b\) (default 1.0). a1 hyperparameter \(a_1\) (default 2.0). b1 hyperparameter \(b_1\) (default 4.0). alpha0 hyperparameter \(\alpha_0\) (default 1.0). beta0 hyperparameter \(\beta_0\) (default 1.0).

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with BerPoi kernel. — anova_bnp_berpoi
text: object class 'anova_bnp_model'.

what: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel. — anova_bnp_normal
title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel. — anova_bnp_normal
text: Fit Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model Gaussian kernel.

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel. — anova_bnp_normal
code: anova_bnp_normal(   y,   X,   iter = 4000L,   warmup = 2000L,   seed = 1L,   n = 50L,   rho = 1,   a = 1,   b = 1,   a0 = 2,   lambda0 = 1,   mu0 = 0,   b0 = 1,   lb = mean(y) - 3 * sd(y),   ub = mean(y) + 3 * sd(y),   standardize_y = FALSE )

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel. — anova_bnp_normal
text: y continuous response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations (default 4000). warmup number warmup mcmc iterations (default 2000). seed seed random number generation (default 1L). n number points y0 computing p(y0 | y) (default 50L). final grid conformed n equispaced points lb ub, see arguments lb ub rho hyperparameter \(\rho\) (default 1.0). hyperparameter \(\) (default 1.0). b hyperparameter \(b\) (default 1.0). a0 hyperparameter \(a_0\) (default 2.0). lambda0 hyperparameter \(\lambda_0\) (default 1.0). mu0 hyperparameter \(\mu_0\) (default 0.0). b0 hyperparameter \(b_0\) (default 1.0). lb lower bound prediction grid, default: mean(y) - 3.0 * sd(y) ub upper bound prediction grid, default: mean(y) + 3.0 * sd(y) standardize_y Select TRUE internally standardize data, fit model, present results original scale

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Gaussian kernel. — anova_bnp_normal
text: object class 'anova_bnp_model'.

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Poisson kernel. — anova_bnp_poisson
text: y integer response vector. X design matrix (full integer covariates). iter total number mcmc iterations (default 4000). warmup number warmup mcmc iterations (default 2000). seed seed random number generation (default 1L). rho hyperparameter \(\rho\) (default 1.0). hyperparameter \(\) (default 1.0). b hyperparameter \(b\) (default 1.0). a1 hyperparameter \(a_1\) (default 2.0). b1 hyperparameter \(b_1\) (default 4.0).

title: Fit a Bayesian nonparametric factorial ANOVA model with Poisson kernel. — anova_bnp_poisson
text: object class 'anova_bnp_model'.
